segments.text: Will they send me a form telling me that I have been granted unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A Notice of Unemployment Insurance Award letter will be sent to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What information will be in that letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Award Letter will inform you as to how much you will receive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other forms will I need to turn in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Every two weeks you will receive a Continued Claim Form that you must turn in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will they be asking me on that form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must show that you were available and that you looked for work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else will they ask me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One of the questions they ask you is if you were well enough to work .
segments.speaker: S2
